body:
/kind bug

**What happened**:
Testing is not working on master (commit 18758f502c4a249bf999f34e4a115ec9881cd9f2) on Mac running High Sierra and Go 1.9.2.

Nil pointer dererefence in TestCadvisorListPodStats:
```
$ date; make test GOFLAGS="-p 1 -v" WHAT=./pkg/kubelet/stats KUBE_TEST_ARGS='-run TestCadvisorListPodStats'; date
Tue Dec 26 14:29:23 PST 2017
Running tests for APIVersion: v1,admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1alpha1,admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1beta1,admission.k8s.io/v1beta1,apps/v1beta1,apps/v1beta2,apps/v1,authentication.k8s.io/v1,authentication.k8s.io/v1beta1,authorization.k8s.io/v1,authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1,autoscaling/v1,autoscaling/v2beta1,batch/v1,batch/v1beta1,batch/v2alpha1,certificates.k8s.io/v1beta1,extensions/v1beta1,events.k8s.io/v1beta1,imagepolicy.k8s.io/v1alpha1,networking.k8s.io/v1,policy/v1beta1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1alpha1,scheduling.k8s.io/v1alpha1,settings.k8s.io/v1alpha1,storage.k8s.io/v1beta1,storage.k8s.io/v1,storage.k8s.io/v1alpha1,
+++ [1226 14:29:28] Running tests without code coverage
=== RUN   TestCadvisorListPodStats
--- FAIL: TestCadvisorListPodStats (0.00s)
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference [recovered]
	panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x10 pc=0x217c0fb]

goroutine 47 [running]:
testing.tRunner.func1(0xc42042e0f0)
	/usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:711 +0x2d2
panic(0x23d0440, 0x32fc760)
	/usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:491 +0x283
time.time.Time.Unix(...)
	/Users/erichole/dev/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/stats/stats_provider_test.go:557
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/stats.checkCPUStats(0xc42042e0f0, 0x26418c0, 0x4, 0x3e8, 0x0)
	/Users/erichole/dev/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/stats/stats_provider_test.go:557 +0xdb
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/stats.TestCadvisorListPodStats(0xc42042e0f0)
	/Users/erichole/dev/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/stats/cadvisor_stats_provider_test.go:233 +0x2e28
testing.tRunner(0xc42042e0f0, 0x26dc568)
	/usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:746 +0xd0
created by testing.(*T).Run
	/usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:789 +0x2de
exit status 2
FAIL	k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/stats	0.085s
make: *** [test] Error 1
Tue Dec 26 14:29:35 PST 2017
```

**What you expected to happen**:
Tests to pass. Compilation is all good.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
`make test GOFLAGS="-p 1 -v" WHAT=./pkg/kubelet/stats KUBE_TEST_ARGS='-run TestCadvisorListPodStats'`

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): MacOSX 10.13.2
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):`Darwin Erics-MacBook-Pro.local 17.3.0 Darwin Kernel Version 17.3.0: Thu Nov  9 18:09:22 PST 2017; root:xnu-4570.31.3~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64`
- Install tools: 
- Others:

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Testing.
labels.name: sig/testing

title: TestCadvisorListPodStats is segfaulting on master with MacOs
